tool.name: SpectraFilterWindowMower
tool.command:
SpectraFilterWindowMower
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_algorithm_windowsize: -algorithm:windowsize $param_algorithm_windowsize #end if #if $param_algorithm_peakcount: -algorithm:peakcount $param_algorithm_peakcount #end if #if $param_algorithm_movetype: -algorithm:movetype #if " " in str($param_algorithm_movetype): "$param_algorithm_movetype" #else $param_algorithm_movetype #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_algorithm_windowsize
param.label: The size of the sliding window along the m/z axis

param.name: param_algorithm_peakcount
param.label: The number of peaks that should be kept

param.name: param_algorithm_movetype
param.label: Whether sliding window (one peak steps) or jumping window (window size steps) should be used

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Applies thresholdfilter to peak spectra.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_SpectraFilterWindowMower.html
